files.description: Single entrypoint script that generates scaffolding, validates required artifacts/content, fails fast on suggests fixes, and writes QA results into outputs/qa/.
Scaffolding generator that creates required directories and materializes REPORT_OUTLINE.md, CASE_STUDY_TEMPLATE, and baseline QA report stubs from templates.
Machine-checkable specification of required files plus content assertions (markers/sections) used by qa_run to validate the scaffold deterministically.
Canonical report outline template used by the scaffolder and asserted by QA for required headings/markers.
Canonical case study template used by the scaffolder and asserted by QA for required sections/markers.
Make targets to run the single QA pipeline (scaffold generation + assertions) via python tools/qa_run.py and ensure outputs/qa/ is produced.
Keeps the outputs/qa directory present in version control while QA reports are generated into it at runtime.

missionDescription: Create a single script/Make target that runs scaffold generation and asserts presence/content of required files (REPORT_OUTLINE.md, CASE_STUDY_TEMPLATE, QA reports), failing fast and writing results into /outputs/qa/.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Provides an automated harness that verifies expected scaffold outputs exist, reducing regressions and ensuring the pipeline consistently produces the required artifacts needed for the pilot and QA rep...
